document.full_text: the gulf cooperation council's secretary general met yemen's president in sanaa on thursday to present the gcc's views on ending a political crisis threatening to plunge the country into further violence.
document.title: gulf region envoy in yemen to discuss crisis
lines_and_colors: the gulf cooperation council's secretary general met yemen's president in sanaa on thursday to present the gcc's views on ending a political crisis threatening to plunge the country into further violence.
